resources.string: Tell me the stop name you would get off
Begin to detect by this stop now?
Stop built success. You can move on the next one or go back to previous page.
There is no stop match the name you input. Try by the other name?
Move the stop icon to the correct position on the map, and press [OK] button.
Find the location where you are going by input the address or landmark.
Please click the map to indicate the stop position.
